basic.description:
This course provides an opportunity for students to develop complex problem solving and critical thinking skills and to apply engineering science knowledge in modeling physical systems through computational software. Examples and
project topics are chosen to complement instruction in engineering science and mathematics courses. Ethical, economic, and social factors are considered in engineering problem solving.
basic.subject: APSC
basic.title: Problem solving and modeling

extra.enrollment_requirement: APSC 101& APSC 102 & APSC 103 Exclusions: APSC 100A & B, Permissions of the instructor or Assoc Dean
